title: Having issues Patching 6.19? Click Here
body:
Hey everyone,

6.19 is here folks! While we get to experience the future of League, Worlds 2016 will be staying with 6.18. With the first day of groups just days away; we finally get to see which teams rise above the rest and which ones get devoured like broccoli in front of Faker:

http://i.imgur.com/eLZ5vUC.gif

While you get to watch the past, we want you playing in the future! If anything is getting in the way of a smooth patch, try some of the fixes below, or shoot us your questions and we’ll help you out there instead!

----------------------------------------------

>#***Files Scanned reaches over 9000!!!!! Or, 15k, 20k, etc***

The patcher needs to scan already installed files to make sure that none of the files are corrupt.  If it finds one, it replaces it and rescans the files.  This is why it can sometimes get as high as 20k, even though there aren't 20k files in the installation.  

**The best thing to do is let it scan files!**  If you restart the client, it may cause it to scan even more files.   The patcher will eventually stop scanning files, and it will patch normally afterward.

>#***Patcher never pops up, or disappears after you press "LAUNCH"***

This can be caused by corruption with the patcher itself or it failed to properly self-patch. Additionally, it may be due to some issues with the configuration of your computer system's permissions (meaning it can't properly save the files in the correct location). To resolve this, make sure to complete all the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)!

>#***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. Many of the most common Anti-virus programs [have already whitelisted LoL](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3), however make sure to update yours to the latest version!

Also, even though you may have set specific exceptions in place before for your security program, League of Legends has gone through a major update. Therefore, your security program may recognize the old version of League of Legends, but not the new version. 

To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

--------------------------------------------------------------

*If after completing these steps, and you still do not see the glorious orange 'LAUNCH' button, feel free to drop us a post in this thread!  Rioters will be on hand to respond and provide some additional help!*

replies.body:
hello, just downloaded the newest patch and i have the same problem as i had with the previous patch. 
After downloading i launch everything is still okay but when i try to play i get into champion select but when the loading screen needs to come an error occurs. i get the popup to reconnect but when i push this button it doesn't work and i keep getting redirected to the reconnect screen. In the previous patch this problem lasted 2 days until my launcher downloaded some new files 2 days after downloading the patch. I really want to play :( can you help me. I'm not the only one with this problem. i looked at the forum and red about 10 different treats about this problem. There has never been a way that solved my problem other then to wait a few days. {{summoner:4}} thanks
I'm having the same problem

Ever since the small update to patch 6.19 I have been getting this pop up when I try to play a game. It comes up after champion select is done and when the game try's to load. I get a black screen for about 15 seconds and then the pop up displays saying " unable to connect to the server please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game" I then try to reconnect but continue to get this pop up repeatedly and can't play the game. Got my first leaver game because of this nonsense. 

What's super silly is that I can play on the EU servers and on the pbe easily but on the NA server which is where my main account is from I can't play at all. I have no idea what I can do to fix this since I've literally tried everything listed on your support website: "https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues" to no avail 

Since it's only happening on the na server I feel like it's coming from your patch or something from your side as I had the game fully playable on na literally a day ago.

Hi everyone,

I have a problem going into game after champ select. I am able to pick a ban, a champion, and wait for the count down until you get to loading screen. BUT, once the timer hits zero it won't go to the loading screen. It freezes on champ select. 

Things I have done when champ select freezes:
1.  restart league
2.  sometimes league doesn't load, so I start a new one and terminate the old one (I continue this until it lets me sign into league.
3. Once I am in, it asks me to reconnect because I have crashed. If I'm lucky, then it loads me into game
4. If when I reconnect and it shows me a notification on how I'm not connected to the internet, I well keep trying again until it does.

(by this time most people have surrendered by now because they think I went ask)

5. If it continues to not reconnect I restart the computer
6. After I restart it, I try sign into league. After this point I give up and play another day.

I have tried sending my technical problems through the website, but have not got a response. I have had a MacBook Pro for about 6 years (any specific information you would have to tell me, not a computer guy). I only play league on it. I have: restarted all settings to my computer, I have taken it into apple to check if it was my computer, and I have tried to uninstall and reinstall.

Exhausted all my options and have exhausted all the players by taking the time out of their league play to surrender and do a remake. I would like to be able play league again like normal. I am even ok with a little lag. Just please someone help me.
Yea I have been having the exact same problem too, where I can get past champ select but the loading screen freezes for me and I have to restart my computer entirely.
My League Client crashed immediately upon going into ARAM champ select and I'm now dealing with a 15 minute leaver buster queue because of this

Hi all,
After updating to 6.19 I can get through champ select and the loading screen afterwards, but when finally getting into the game, my computer crashes at 00:02 or a little after that. I'm running on Windows 10 and have never had this problem before. I think the last time it patched there was a hotfix or a few extra files added that might be causing my problems since I remember playing at least one game all the way through in patch 6.19 when it just came out. (I believe Keuppia said he had the same issue)
Any help would be appreciated.

I am experiencing a crashing problem in the patch 6.19 I did repair the game twice to be sure but the client is still crashing + after the quote"30 seconds until minions spawn" the game crashes (this time in game) and this makes me miss a few CS + early xp I need help

I'm having problems in game. The music is all scratchy and after a while the game will freeze out of no where and i have to hard restart my computer. I"ve tried uninstalling and reintalling and repairing the client but nothing is working. Patch 6.18 ran perfectly on my computer.
Yup! I've got the same problem.
I finally manged to fix it!
How??
My computer crash everytime when it is loading the game or inside the game after  i downloaded patch 6.19. And I had no such issues with the earlier patches

I have the same issue, every time without fail the game freezes up. I've done nothing but make regular windows updates because its a brand new laptop. Now i have 20 minutes bans all the time because i go in and it gets worse everytime...rito plz help me

Please help I literally have no idea what to do. I am going to do a client repair, but it is frustrating to not know what is causing this issue.
Omg just realized i left this in the wrong area... sorry people.
You may have put this is the wrong place but how did you fix it? :D Im having the same Problem aswell.

A bugsplat usually means that the game files have corrupted. This can happen when a new patch rolls through if the patcher doesn't update properly. Luckily there's the [Crash Guide](http://riot.com/1Fa5J8l) to help you get repaired! You can test in a custom game to make sure everything is running smoothly after you're done.

Same thing happening to me:
CreateVertexBufferD3D9 failed: 0

Started this morning after M$ shoved a windows update down my throat, so pretty sure it's related to that since I played fine yesterday. Have an older Nvidia 570 GFX card, not sure why D3D is suddenly failing...

Tried updating drivers, performing all windows updates, and uninstalled LOL, deleted the remaining files and reinstalled LOL - still borked.
I can't access my friends list, notifications, chats. Please help.

That's a connection issue! It's unable to connect any of the communication modules. If you work through the steps in the [Connection Guide](http://riot.com/12B7oac) that should fix it, and you'll be chatting in no time!

My client is freezing up my entire computer almost every time the match starts now. I've tried using different compatibility settings, even going so far as reinstalling league. I'm not having any issues with other games. I've considered that there may be a conflict of some sort with the recent windows update but i want to make absolutely sure that something can't be fixed on this end before I try anything on that side of things or go so far as to use {{summoner:1}} on my entire hardrive. I've tried so many things that i'm in low priority right now and these 20 minute waits just to find out that the changes i made aren't working are slowly killing me. (and my teammates for that matter).

plz halp
this might be just a coincidence but i figure it's worth mentioning anyway just in case. the only time i got the freeze was when i tried to play jungle irelia.

Hello, never had an issue patching before now. When I updated to this patch the icon for the non-admin launcher turned into an error icon, and I didn't regard this as much aside from an annoyance; looked ugly in my taskbar, but who cares, right? After a few days of using the admin-launcher becuase it had a proper icon, I uninstalled the client and reinstalled in an attempt fix the wonky icon but found, much to my chagrin, that it simply returned with an error icon. I uninstalled again, and then manually uninstalled any remnants that I could locate on my system as it says to do on the support page. When I re-downloaded the installer and ran it, it did... not work as it should, simply put. The installer itself worked fine, as I'm able to tell, but when I ran the client it created on my system I ran into some major errors that render it practically unusable. Firstly, it reverts my monitor to the lowest possible resolution that it can support (640x480, 256 colours, 60 hertz), and then loads the client window in an absurd size; in fact, I was able to get a screenshot once I set the screen resolution back to it's highest setting (1366x768, true colour, 32 bit, 60 hertz), and here it is ->http://i.imgur.com/fvQ1UOP.png<- the bottom of the client window is around the bottom of the left paw, but this is undemonstratable through screenshot as I am unable to drag the client window. I attempted to do a clean install once more after encountering this issue, but it has happened again nonetheless. Does this sound like a run-of-the-mill issue, and is there anyway this can be resolved? I quite enjoyed playing the occasional match.

Ever since iv'e updated to patch 6.19 I keep crashing when at the home screen or in game and it doesn't crash to the desktop it just freezes and has the Windows troubleshooter pop up, is there any way to fix this, other than turning off the IP Helper.

Hey so i cant connect to any games anymore every time i try to i get a bug splat, i have tried to reinstall and sadly it didn't work. Tried to repair no avail as well as going through all of "https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes" but nothing seems to work you guys got any idea?

Thnx
